analysis.description:
HumaniqICO.calculateTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0xdf2b47c4a9b735502e41ec6fe386a6b9ead7d38b.sol#298-307) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- HumaniqICO.discountedPrice

HumaniqICO.getBonus (/unique_chucks/29/0xdf2b47c4a9b735502e41ec6fe386a6b9ead7d38b.sol#280-298) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- startDate == 0

HumaniqICO.getBonus (/unique_chucks/29/0xdf2b47c4a9b735502e41ec6fe386a6b9ead7d38b.sol#280-298) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- startDate == 0
HumaniqICO.startICO (/unique_chucks/29/0xdf2b47c4a9b735502e41ec6fe386a6b9ead7d38b.sol#426-435) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- isICOActive == false && startDate == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xdf2b47c4a9b735502e41ec6fe386a6b9ead7d38b.sol:
	Contract HumaniqToken has payable functions:
	 - issueTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0xdf2b47c4a9b735502e41ec6fe386a6b9ead7d38b.sol#149-164)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
